name: Shrimp Fried Rice
description:
Play as a humble hibachi restaurant chef, Bubba the Shrimp. Balance taking customer orders, bussing tables and cleaning the floors all while making sure not to mess up in front of the manager. Survive your shift by making few enough mistakes to not get fired before the day is over!

Characters, SFX & Props: Grace Bowman

Programming, Voice Over, Game Design & Animation: Luke DeSimone

Programming & Game Design: Phil Echavarria

Project Lead, Programming & Game Design: Matthias Hunt

Props: Vinay Ranganathan
